### CORRELATIONS
```{r}
us_cpt <- read_csv("../Data/US/df_us_cpt_socdist.csv")
ger_cpt <- read_csv("../Data/GER/df_ger_cpt_socdist.csv")
```


```{r}
us_cpt %>% dplyr::select(pers_o, pers_c, pers_e, pers_a, pers_n, 
                         onset_prev, slope_prev, cpt_day_socdist_2, mean_diff_socdist_2,
                         age, male, conservative, 
                         academics, medinc, manufact, 
                         airport_dist, tourism, healthcare, popdens) %>% 
  cor(use='pairwise.complete') %>% as.data.frame() %>% 
  write_csv('../Data/US/us_cor.csv')
```


```{r}
ger_cpt %>% dplyr::select(pers_o, pers_c, pers_e, pers_a, pers_n, 
                         onset_prev, slope_prev, cpt_day_socdist_2, mean_diff_socdist_2,
                         age, male, conservative, 
                         academics, medinc, manufact, 
                         airport_dist, tourism, healthcare, popdens) %>% 
  cor(use='pairwise.complete') %>% as.data.frame() %>% 
  write_csv('../Data/GER/ger_cor.csv')
```
